text: Meer Ali is an Indian Television actor and a fashion Model. He is Currently seen playing lead in &TV;'s show Main Bhi Ardhangini. He is also playing Devraj Indra in Sony TV's show Vighnaharta Ganesha. has done many roles in various Hindi Television shows, played lead in shows like Miley Jab Hum Tum,Dahleez (2016 TV series),, and Was also seen in special stories of P.I Private Investigator, Savdhaan India, Aahat (season 6) and CID. Meer Ali was nominated in the category Best Actor in a Negative Role in Zee TV's Gold Awards 2019 September 2019.
